name: on a bed in leeds
description:
baby's first twine game and it's really short! made for a school brief where we had to design a transcript from a 5-minute conversation with someone about our extended study project.

module: preparation for extended study, 2022.

cheers to this cheat sheet, adam hammond's beginner's guide to twine, and ofc the harlowe manual for making my first stumble into twine just a little more graceful.
